column2: Spain asks for the ownership of Catalonia

Napoleon annexed Catalonia when he began his invasion of Spain. But now that Spain is an ally and a power to be reckoned with, they ask that we give them Catalonia back, as a proof of friendship between our two nations.
After the difficult time that followed the invasion of our glorious nation by the french, we are finally recovering !
